1. Download all files from GitHub link to your PC.
2. Run Eclipse IDE.
3. Import all files into Eclipse.
4. Run server with a main method.
5. Run client with a main method.
6. Try to test a number of commands: 

   "ping" - to check, if server work well.

   "echo <text>" - to get echo text from server.

   "generate D:\test.txt"  - to create txt file with list of random numbers in the directory (D:\text.txt is EXAMPLE).

   "process D:\test.txt D:\test(process).txt" - to use ShellSort for generated file and create a new processed file.

   "stop" - to stop server work.

   "exit" - to exit from console.

7. Enjoy :)
